message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $115. I think it's a great deal and would be very beneficial for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm looking to save as much as I can on this purchase.
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above that. How about we try $95? I'm willing to compromise, but I'm looking to save as much as I can.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  To be fair to us both, I can't go lower than $100 for this. It's my final offer.
I understand that you can't go lower than $100, but I'm still trying to save as much as I can. How about $99?
